message: Suppose I wanted to convert the word "Thor" to a link to the new movie's web site. I can extract the word just fine, but how do I replace it with the link markup? Is there some jQuery method to make this happen?
get the parent of the text element where the word "Thor" appears and do something like theparent.html(textwhereIreplacedThorWithALinkToNewMovieWebsite_byTheWayIsThorWorseWatching_?);
I liked Thor. Better than Clash of the Titans.
Play Empire Avenue? Check out http://apps.kynetx.com/installable_apps/4147-tweet-empire_2011-05-10 -- turn EAv ticker symbols into clickable links.
If you try it let me know what you think.
